## AQUASTAT

Information on water at the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO).

http://www.fao.org/nr/water/aquastat/main/index.stm

<br/>

## Global Surface Water Explorer

Global or 10$^{\circ}$x10$^{\circ}$ tiles Landsat imagery covering location and temporal distribution of water surfaces over the past 32 years, including information on occurrence, change, seasonality, recurrence, transitions and maximum extent.

https://global-surface-water.appspot.com/

<br/>

## WATCH

Data sets for regional and global studies on climate and water. Accessible via CEH (Centre for Ecology and Hydrology) gateway catalogue. Including maps displaying WATCH topics "Rainfall", "Freshwater", "Evaporation" and "Land".

http://www.eu-watch.org/data_availability

http://www.waterandclimatechange.eu/

https://eip.ceh.ac.uk/
